dcterms:creator: S. M. Jiménez-Zafra

dcterms:description: A Spanish corpus annotated with negation for sentiment analysis, containing 400 reviews across eight domains, with annotations for negation cues, negation scope, and relevance of the negation to sentiment.
dcterms:title: SFU ReviewSP-NEG
